Name: B-52 Frozen
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.
Crumble a piece of Cadbury's Flake over the cocktail.
Review: The classic shot blended with ice.
